mapper.select:
select A.show_no as no, A.category_no as categoryNo, A.show_name as name, A.viewing_no as viewingNo, A.running_time as runningTime, A.poster_img as posterImg, A.begin_date as beginDate, A.end_date as endDate, A.place_no as placeNo, B.place_name as placeName, A.attention_img as attentionImg, A.sale_img as saleImg, A.show_detail_img as showDetailImg, A.show_created_date as createdDate from shows A, show_place B where A.place_no = B.place_no and a.end_date > sysdate
and B.local_name =#{localName}
order by show_no desc
order by end_date asc
order by show_name asc

select rn, Y.show_no, Y.show_name, TO_CHAR(Y.begin_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BEGIN_DATE, TO_CHAR(Y.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DATE, Y.poster_img, Z.place_no, Z.place_name from ( select show_no, row_number() over (order by cnt desc) rn from ( select c.show_no, count(*) cnt from show_ticket_orders A, show_put_shows B, shows C, show_categories D where A.put_show_no = B.put_show_no and B.show_no = C.show_no and C.category_no = D.category_no
and D.top_category_no = #{genre}
and to_char(A.order_created_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')
and A.order_created_date > sysdate - 7
and to_char(A.order_created_date, 'yyyy/mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm')
and to_char(A.order_created_date, 'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy')
group by C.show_no ) )X, shows Y, show_place Z where rn >= 1 and rn <= 10 and X.show_no = Y.show_no and Y.place_no = Z.place_no order by rn asc
select SEAT_NO AS no, SHOW_SEAT_NO AS showSeatNo, PUT_SHOW_NO AS putShowNo, TICKET AS ticket from show_seat where PUT_SHOW_NO = #{putShowNo}

select SHOW_NO AS no, SHOW_NAME AS name, VIEWING_NO AS viewingNo, RUNNING_TIME AS runningTime, POSTER_IMG AS posterImg, BEGIN_DATE AS beginDate, END_DATE AS endDate, PLACE_NO AS placeNo, ATTENTION_IMG AS attentionImg, SALE_IMG AS saleImg, SHOW_DETAIL_IMG AS showDetailImg, show_created_date AS createdDate from ( select * from shows A, show_categories B where b.top_category_no = #{catno} and a.category_no = b.category_no order by begin_date desc ) where rownum<=4

select SHOW_NO AS no, CATEGORY_NO AS categoryNo, SHOW_NAME AS name, VIEWING_NO AS viewingNo, RUNNING_TIME AS runningTime, POSTER_IMG AS posterImg, BEGIN_DATE AS beginDate, END_DATE AS endDate, PLACE_NO AS placeNo, ATTENTION_IMG AS attentionImg, SALE_IMG AS saleImg, SHOW_DETAIL_IMG AS showDetailImg, show_created_date AS createdDate from ( select * from shows order by begin_date desc ) where rownum<=4

select A.SHOW_NO AS no, A.CATEGORY_NO AS categoryNo, A.SHOW_NAME AS name, A.VIEWING_NO AS viewingNo, A.RUNNING_TIME AS runningTime, A.POSTER_IMG AS posterImg, A.BEGIN_DATE AS beginDate, A.END_DATE AS endDate, A.PLACE_NO AS placeNo, B.PLACE_NAME AS placeName, A.ATTENTION_IMG AS attentionImg, A.SALE_IMG AS saleImg, A.SHOW_DETAIL_IMG AS showDetailImg, A.show_created_date AS createdDate from shows A, show_place B where category_no = #{catno} and A.place_No = B.place_no

select A.SHOW_NO AS no, A.CATEGORY_NO AS categoryNo, A.SHOW_NAME AS showName, A.VIEWING_NO AS viewingNo, C.VIEWING_GRADE_SD AS viewingGradeSd, C.VIEWING_GRADE_NAME AS viewingGradeName, A.RUNNING_TIME AS runningTime, A.POSTER_IMG AS posterImg, A.BEGIN_DATE AS beginDate, A.END_DATE AS endDate, A.PLACE_NO AS placeNo, B.PLACE_NAME AS placeName, B.PLACE_ADDRESS AS placeAddress, A.ATTENTION_IMG AS attentionImg, A.SALE_IMG AS saleImg, A.SHOW_DETAIL_IMG AS showDetailImg, A.show_created_date AS createdDate from shows A, show_place B, show_viewing_grades C where show_no = #{no} and A.place_No = B.place_no and A.VIEWING_NO = C.VIEWING_NO
SELECT PUT_SHOW_NO AS putShowNo, SHOW_NO AS showNo, SHOW_DAY AS day, SHOW_START_TIME AS startTime FROM SHOW_PUT_SHOWS WHERE SHOW_NO = #{showNo}

select A.show_no as showNo, A.show_name as showName, B.put_show_no as putShowNo, B.show_day as day, B.show_start_time as startTime from shows A, show_put_shows B where B.put_show_no = #{value} and a.show_no = b.show_no

select a.seat_no as seatNo, a.show_seat_no as showSeatNo, a.put_show_no as putShowNo, a.ticket as ticket, b.show_no as showNo, b.show_day as showDay, b.show_start_time as showStartTime, c.category_no as categoryNo, c.show_name as showName, c.viewing_no as viewingNo, c.running_time as runningTme, c.poster_Img as posterImg, c.begin_Date as beginDate, c.end_Date as endDate, c.place_No as placeNo, c.attention_Img as attentionImg, c.sale_Img as saleImg, c.show_Detail_Img as showDetailImg, c.show_created_Date as createdDate, d.seat_Grade as seatGrade, d.seat_price as seatPrice from ( select * from show_seat where put_show_no=#{putShowNo}) A, show_put_shows B, shows C, show_place_seat D where show_seat_no=#{seatNo} and B.put_show_no = #{putShowNo} and b.show_no = c.show_no and c.place_no = d.place_no and d.seat_no = show_seat_no
select SEAT_NO AS no, SHOW_SEAT_NO AS showSeatNo, PUT_SHOW_NO AS putShowNo, TICKET AS ticket from show_seat where show_seat_no = #{seatNo} and put_show_no = #{putShowNo}

select rn, Y.show_no as no, Y.poster_img as posterImg, Y.show_name as name, Y.begin_date as beginDate, end_date as endDate, Y.poster_img, Z.place_no as placeNo, Z.place_name as placeName from ( select show_no, row_number() over (order by cnt desc) rn from ( select c.show_no, count(*) cnt from show_ticket_orders A, show_put_shows B, shows C where A.put_show_no = B.put_show_no and B.show_no = C.show_no group by C.show_no ) )X, shows Y, show_place Z where rn <= 3 and X.show_no = Y.show_no and Y.place_no = Z.place_no

select A.show_no as no, A.category_no as categoryNo, A.show_name as name, A.viewing_no as viewingNo, A.running_time as runningTime, A.poster_img as posterImg, A.begin_date as beginDate, A.end_date as endDate, A.place_no as placeNo, B.place_name as placeName, A.attention_img as attentionImg, A.sale_img as saleImg, A.show_detail_img as showDetailImg, A.show_created_date as createdDate from shows A, show_place B where A.place_no = B.place_no and a.category_no =#{catno} and a.end_date > sysdate
order by show_no desc
order by end_date asc
order by show_name asc
